tool_description: Shows when the next bus is coming.
name: TTC Times
title: TTC Times

api_list.name: Get TTC Times
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ttc-times.p.rapidapi.com/ttc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ttc-times.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ttc-times.p.rapidapi.com/ttc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ttc-times.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
